anyOf.description: A single, primary detection antibody was bound to the protein of interest.
Detection was done via two antibodies. A secondary enzyme-linked antibody bound to the primary detection antibody, which is bound to the protein of interest.
The antigen of interest is bound between two antibodies, a capture and a detection antibody.
Two antibodies are used, an enzyme-conjugated antibody and an antibody that is present in the serum, if the serum is positive. The two antibodies compete to bind to the antigen of interest
